product_name: Twin Six The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey for women from Twin Six feels so luxurious and has such cool graphics you'll want to wear it on all your rides, long or short. Soft polyester wicks away perspiration and dries quickly, so you stay cool and collected on race day. Full-front hidden zipper makes on/off and venting a breeze. 3 back pockets stow energy snacks and gear. Twin Six The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey for women is made in the U.S.A.
short_description: The ARTCRANK Bike Jersey for women from Twin Six feels so luxurious and has such cool graphics you'll want to wear it on all your rides, long or short.
